biography.bio: Leo de Hartogh was born on June 2, 1916 in Rotterdam, Zuid-Holland, Netherlands as Leopold de Hartogh. He was an actor, known for Young Hearts (1936), De wachters bij het graf (1960) and Zomerzotheid (1936). He was married to Teddy Schaank. He died on October 5, 2007 in The Hague, Zuid-Holland.
biography.name: Leo de Hartogh

biography.bio: Rini Otte was born on April 26, 1917 in Amsterdam, Noord-Holland, Netherlands as Sara Catharina Otte. She was an actress, known for Young Hearts (1936), Comédie de l'argent (1936) and Ergens in Nederland (1940). She was married to Fritz Helmuth Landshoff and Jan Retèl. She died on May 19, 1991 in Amsterdam.
biography.name: Rini Otte

biography.bio: Lizzy Dernburg is an actress, known for Young Hearts (1936).
biography.name: Lizzy Dernburg

biography.bio: Adriaan Van Hees was born on May 3, 1910 in Rotterdam, Zuid-Holland, Netherlands. He was an actor, known for Young Hearts (1936), Zomerzotheid (1936) and Het leven is niet zo kwaad (1935). He died on December 2, 1976 in Vlissingen, Zeeland, Netherlands.
biography.name: Adriaan Van Hees

biography.bio: Martha Posno was born on June 5, 1916 in Amsterdam, Noord-Holland, Netherlands. She was an actress, known for Young Hearts (1936) and Forty Years (1938). She died on January 17, 1994 in the Netherlands.
biography.name: Martha Posno

biography.bio: Loesje Bouwmeester was born as Louise Vis. She is an actress, known for De familie van mijn vrouw (1935) and Young Hearts (1936).
biography.name: Loesje Bouwmeester

biography.bio: Louis De Bree was born on April 27, 1884 in Amsterdam, Noord-Holland, Netherlands. He was an actor and writer, known for De man zonder hart (1937), The Cross-Patch (1935) and Klokslag twaalf (1936). He died on May 4, 1971 in Amersfoort, Utrecht, Netherlands.
biography.name: Louis De Bree

biography.bio: Herre de Vos was born on November 2, 1877 in Amsterdam, Noord-Holland, Netherlands. He was an actor, known for Levensschaduwen (1916), Young Hearts (1936) and Tom Thumb in Trouble (1940). He died on February 17, 1948 in Amsterdam.
biography.name: Herre de Vos

biography.bio: Margot Hoppenbrouwers is an actress, known for Fientje Peters - Poste restante (1935) and Young Hearts (1936).
biography.name: Margot Hoppenbrouwers

biography.bio: Heinz Josephson is a director and writer, known for Young Hearts (1936) and Dutch in Seven Lessons (1948). He was previously married to Rita Roland.
biography.name: Heinz Josephson

biography.bio: Kommer Kleijn is an actor, known for Tomorrow It Will Be Better (1939), Suikerfreule (1935) and Young Hearts (1936).
biography.name: Kommer Kleijn

biography.bio: Jacqueline Royaards-Sandberg was born on October 27, 1876 in Pamekasan, Dutch Indies. She was an actress, known for Un soir, un train (1968), Young Hearts (1936) and Een zonnige morgen (1962). She was married to Willem Royaards. She died on March 30, 1976 in Amsterdam, Noord-Holland, Netherlands.
biography.name: Jacqueline Royaards-Sandberg

biography.bio: Carl Tobi is an actor, known for The Lion's Mouse (1923), Hidden Lives (1920) and John Heriot's Wife (1920).
biography.name: Carl Tobi

biography.bio: Robbie van Spiegel is an actor, known for Young Hearts (1936).
biography.name: Robbie van Spiegel

biography.bio: Emilie van Stuve is an actress, known for Het meisje met den blauwen hoed (1934) and Young Hearts (1936).
biography.name: Emilie van Stuve
